WorkItem.Description:
When reading a file cell by cell on some files (very rarely) I get this error.
It happens when I run this function:

PHPExcel_Shared_Date::isDateTime($cell)

There is no other way to extract a date from a cell, so this is a dead end for me.
I have attached an example file which crashes PHPExcel
WorkItem.Summary: PHP Fatal error: Call to a member function getNumberFormat() on a non-object in /home/sms/include/PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Style/NumberFormat.php on line 134
